job_id.description: The job IDs for which to calculate overall bucket results

top_n.description: The number of top job bucket scores to be used in the overall_score calculation

bucket_span.description: The span of the overall buckets. Defaults to the longest job bucket_span

overall_score.description: Returns overall buckets with overall scores higher than this value

exclude_interim.description: If true overall buckets that include interim buckets will be excluded

start.description: Returns overall buckets with timestamps after this time

end.description: Returns overall buckets with timestamps earlier than this time

allow_no_jobs.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no jobs. (This includes `_all` string or when no jobs have been specified)

body.description: Overall bucket selection details if not provided in URI
